creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
markings: upper center: rectangular intaglio:   不如学 {Fu’nyo gaku}; LRQ, in skeleton's hand, rectangular intaglio: 此画此時一談一笑 {Kono e koko toki ittan isshō} (this painting, this time, one chat, one laugh); LRC, top seal below signature, square intaglio: 恪印 {Kakuin}; LRC, lower seal below signature; square relief:  土斎 {Dosai}
signed: Bottom right: 土井恪作 {Doi Kaku saku}
title: Skeleton
